title: Best movie of 2019
review: Amazing story, vivid, you cannot stop watching until the very end!

movie_title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
title: The best Star Wars movie you will ever see
review: Amazingly written, crazy good actors, great filmography. Flawless. Personal and deep characters. All Star Wars movies should be impeccable as this masterpiece.

title: One of the bests marvel movies
review: Hilarious, innovative, creative and full of improvisations. Great movie!

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Amazing movie!
review: Don't listen to the bad reviews!! Go watch it and make up your mind. I'm a die hard Star Wars fan, love the franchise and love the 3rd trilogy finale. Totally worth watching! But I still think the best movie from the new trilogy is 'the force awakens', anyway, my opinion! Enjoy the movie, it is awesome!!

title: Don't listen to the bad reviews!
review: Crazy good movie! If your into accurate historical movie this is it! Amazing actors, Woody Harrelson in a great performance! Totally worth watching!!
